citations.narrative:
Pens #3, #5, #7, #9, and #10 containing a combined total of 7 dogs all had pen dividers where the paint was worn and
excessive rust was present. These areas cannot be properly cleaned and sanitized. Areas in contact with dogs that
cannot be effectively cleaned and sanitized can lead to disease and cause odors. Replace or repair these dividers.
Correct by: 9/22/2024

Pens #3, #5, #7, #9, and #10 containing a combined total of 7 dogs all had areas where the floor had been chewed by the
dogs. These areas all contained sharp edges and in some case the holes were big enough for the dogs’ feet to pass
through the flooring. Pen # 10 also had a door that had been chewed causing sharp edges on the door. Pen #3 also had a
window frame that had been chewed causing sharp edges. The floors, doors and surfaces of kennel runs must be kept in
good repair to prevent injury to the dogs contained in them. Repair or replace these floors, door and window frame.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.1(c)(1)(i) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
Pens #3, #5, #7, #9, and #10 containing a combined total of 7 dogs all had pen dividers where the paint was worn and 
excessive rust was present. These areas cannot be properly cleaned and sanitized. Areas in contact with dogs that 
cannot be effectively cleaned and sanitized can lead to disease and cause odors. Replace or repair these dividers. 
Correct by: 9/22/2024 
3.6(a)(1)  Repeat
   
Primary enclosures. 
Pens #3, #5, #7, #9, and #10 containing a combined total of 7 dogs all had areas where the floor had been chewed by the 
dogs. These areas all contained sharp edges and in some case the holes were big enough for the dogs’ feet to pass 
through the flooring. Pen # 10 also had a door that had been chewed causing sharp edges on the door. Pen #3 also had a 
window frame that had been chewed causing sharp edges. The floors, doors and surfaces of kennel runs must be kept in 
good repair to prevent injury to the dogs contained in them. Repair or replace these floors, door and window frame. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
